channel.title: Help with wielding items in the wrong spot
channel.description: Hi I have been working on my server/client and i had bunch of nulls before but now i have one small problem that i think can be fixed easily everytime someone wears the bear head it is equiped in the cape spot how do i fix this help is very much appreciated

item.title: Help with wielding items in the wrong spot
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.source: Help with wielding items in the wrong spot

item.title: Help with wielding items in the wrong spot
item.dc:creator: @lordante lordante
item.description:
@lordante wrote:

get the ID No. and place it in the Item.JAVA.
Once you done that then goto Item#4.JAVA >> complie >> Runclient

Hope that helped

Read full topic
item.source: Help with wielding items in the wrong spot
